Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $150. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an introductory price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
